alert.note: Alert for Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:40AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Olmsted County through 430 AM CDT... At 340 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pine Island to 8 miles east of Hayfield. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oronoco around 350 AM CDT. Stewartville around 355 AM CDT. Chatfield around 415 AM CDT. Dover around 420 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Salem Corners, Hidden Meadows R V Park, Rock Dell, Rochester Airport, Kings Park, and Pleasant Grove. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 205 and 232. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
